ModMetaData.name: Titular Royalty
ModMetaData.author: Canon
ModMetaData.description: Adds titles to the player faction you can grant to your pawns with the Staff of Royalty or at Any Throne (VERSION 1.7) - Title Editor UI available in the Manage Titles menu. - You can use this to override the title labels, whether it can be inherited, can use meditation focus, what icon it uses and what expectations it has. - Can now open the manage titles UI using the crown button on the bottom right buttons - You can also change the Icons the title uses, it takes any icon in Textures/TRIcons or the default for the Title Tier - Vanilla Factions Expanded - Empire Integrations (Sophiamundan Titleset with their Icons, All titles show icons on infocard, these require it to be active and dont include any files themselves) (VERSION 1.7.1) - Fixed Support with VFEE (def icons) - Minor Code Changes (VERSION 1.7.2) - Allowed thrones from EGI Holograms and Projectors to be used as Thrones for the highest title (VERSION 1.7.3) - Updated to support Rimworld 1.5 - Dropped 1.3 support, download an old version from the github if you still really need it.
